projects.title: PCA Analysis of Quasar UV Spectra
projects.subtitle: Astronomical Data Science & Spectroscopy
projects.description: Applied Principal Component Analysis to reconstruct full quasar continuum spectra from red-side spectral weights and reproduced mean transmitted flux vs. redshift relation.
projects.extendedDescription: Implemented advanced spectroscopic analysis techniques using Python with astronomical data processing libraries. Performed dimensionality reduction on high-resolution UV data to extract meaningful patterns from complex quasar spectra. Successfully reconstructed complete continuum spectra demonstrating mastery of both statistical methods and astrophysical data analysis.
projects.impact: Successfully reconstructed full quasar continuum spectra from partial spectral data using advanced PCA techniques

projects.title: Deming Regression Analysis of Tully-Fisher Relation
projects.subtitle: Bayesian Analysis of Galaxy Velocity-Luminosity Data
projects.description: Performed novel Bayesian linear regression analysis accounting for X and Y uncertainties in galaxy velocity-luminosity data
projects.extendedDescription: Extended the analysis to early/late-type spiral galaxies to get a more accurate distance indicator
projects.impact: Novel Bayesian approach accounting for bidirectional uncertainties, extending analysis to multiple galaxy populations

projects.title: NFL Data Analysis & Prediction
projects.subtitle: Machine Learning for Sports Analytics
projects.description: Trained neural network and random forest models to analyze 50,000+ NFL plays and predict pivotal NFL plays with 75%+ precision
projects.extendedDescription: Predicted fumble probability and identified key correlational features while classifying shotgun vs. non-shotgun formations
projects.impact: Achieved 75%+ precision in NFL play prediction with feature extraction pipeline processing 50,000+ plays

projects.title: Analysis of One-Dimensional Thermal Conductivity
projects.subtitle: Computational Physics & Numerical Methods
projects.description: Confirmed 1D thermal conductivity behavior in space and time along a copper rod matches Modified Heat Equation predictions.
projects.extendedDescription: Performed statistical analysis and data analytics with Python and numerical computations with C++ (faster).
projects.impact: Successfully reproduced 1D thermal conductivity behavior in space and time along a copper rod using numerical methods.
